page.title: 13The Cunningham 393 Club
page.content: This is the popular{Country Club found on the Naval housing estate at {Northover.}It is run by my Mum and Dad We open every night except Sunday and Monday.Each Tuesday is{Children's {Night}when a disco is held and Mark, the disc jockey, will play any pop music that is requested.The dance floor is tiled with little mirrors decorated with flowers.There are hotdogs,crisps and soft drinks to buy. On Fridays and Saturdays people have to dress smartly.Anyone wearing jeans or a T-shirt will not be let in.Casual dress is fine for the other nights. We employ{7 helpers}part time to assist with the cleaning,help to prepare and serve the food and organise the entertainment.We buy in most of our provisions from Yeovil but the meat comes from the village butcher. EMILY COLEMAN
